[vc_custom_heading text=”We are a group with social orientation and we shall assist you in all possible manner to boost your businesses in any field which is within our preview. We are almost a decade old in the field of international trade, and the first ever company of Uttar Pradesh, to accord the status of Star Export House by Directorate General of Foreign Trade, which adds another golden stroke.

AVS is synonymous with dedication and hard work, coupled with enriched experience, giving the patrons the highest satisfaction.” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:16|text_align:left|color:%23002949|line_height:1.8″ google_fonts=”font_family:Montserrat%3Aregular%2C700|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1603972968626{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}”]
